title: 16-hour water cut on Saturday (18)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); National Water Supply and Drainage Board (NWSDB) announced that due to pipeline improvement work the water supply will be interrupted for 16 hours from 11.00 PM on Saturday (18) to 3.00 PM on Sunday (19).
The supply of water will be suspended for Colombo 05 and 06 and the low-pressure supply will be experienced in Colombo 04.

Biden administration announces additional $1 billion in military aid for Ukraine
